title: Windows Vista Ultimate 64 SP1 Activator  NO BS!
description: This is for Windows Vista Ultimate 64 Bit. This MUST be installed BEFORE any updates and BEFORE the installation of SP1. You can update 100% with no problems AFTER you install the crack. If you try to install the crack after you install updates you won&#039;t be able to boot into Windows. I have used this crack for about a year and it STILL works after I installed Service Pack 1. It&#039;s similar to other Vista Loaders EXCEPT this is a GRUB Loader, I really don&#039;t know the specifics on how it is different from other loaders, I just know it is still working after the installation of SP1 while other Loaders are failing. Enjoy and please seed!
